content: sts round 4 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2sc round 2 single_crochet 2sc x2 6 sts round 3 single_crochet 2sc x3 9 sts in next st x3 12 sts scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 4 tuck tail of magic loop into tip of bulb round 5 single_crochet in all sts around 12 sts round 6 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2sc in next st x4 16 sts round 7-8 single_crochet in all sts around 16 st round 9 invisible decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts x4 12 sts stuff firmly scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 5 round 10 invisible decrease single_crochet x4 8 sts round 11 slip_stitch in all sts around to create a ridge for joining leaving the piece open fo 8 sts tuck yarn tail into the neck of the bulb socket make an equal number to bulbs using your chosen cord/socket color this piece is worked from the back of the socket where it will join the cord forward to where it will be stitched on to the last round of the bulb round 1 make a magic loop with 4 single_crochet slip_stitch to join round 4 sts round 2 chain 1 starting in same st 2sc in each st around slip_stitch to join round gently manipulate stitches into a flat disc before continuing 8 sts round 3 chain 1 starting in same st single_crochet in blo in all sts around do not join rounds 8 sts round 4 single_crochet in all sts around do not join rounds 8 sts round 5 one single_crochet in first st in round this gives a more even edge socket is complete do not fasten_off scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 6 visual guide socket round 1 make a magic loop with 4 single_crochet slip_stitch to join round 4 sts round 2 chain 1 starting in same st 2sc in each st around slip_stitch to join round gently manipulate stitches into a flat disc before continuing 8 sts scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 7 round 3 chain 1 starting in same st single_crochet in blo in all sts around do not join rounds 8 sts round 4 single_crochet in all sts around do not join rounds 8 sts round 5 one single_crochet in first st in round this gives a more even edge socket is complete do not fasten_off scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 8 join to bulb continuing as if on another round match final round of sts on one bulb to one socket and use single_crochet to join flos of socket and bulb 8 sts add a small amount of stuffing to the socket before the pieces are fully joined scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 9 slip_stitch to join to start of joining round fo leaving a long tail 10 suggested for sewing using a yarn needle thread the yarn
